00038 void RequestHandlerAttrGet::run() {
00039   ResponseCallbackAttrGet cb(m_comm, m_event_ptr);
00040   size_t remaining = m_event_ptr->messageLen - 2;
00041   uint8_t *msgPtr = m_event_ptr->message + 2;
00042   const char *name;
00043   uint64_t handle;
00044 
00045   // handle
00046   if (!Serialization::decode_long(&msgPtr, &remaining, &handle))
00047     goto abort;
00048 
00049   // name
00050   if (!Serialization::decode_string(&msgPtr, &remaining, &name))
00051     goto abort;
00052 
00053   m_master->attr_get(&cb, m_session_id, handle, name);
00054 
00055   return;
00056 
00057  abort:
00058   HT_ERROR("Encoding problem with ATTRGET message");
00059   cb.error(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Encoding problem with ATTRGET message");
00060 }
